sys_remote_update_set.description:
From: Mehta, Heenal Sent: Thursday, January 28, 2016 11:58 AM To: Spitzer, Ian; Vora, Hardik; Longsjo, Jason Cc: Govindan, Sase; Wang, Shuo (Sophie Twu); Shakir, Kamal Subject: Firewall request form - Modifications
Hi Ian,
According the feedbacks we received from the customers, we would like to make some changes in our firewall request form to make it more user friendly.
We would like to reframe the second question in the form to –
1. Do you want your server to communicate with the internal / DMZ / internet? 2. We would like to add the following sentence – For multiple ports, enter the ports separated by ',' i.e. 80,443,22.
sys_remote_update_set.name: HV - STRY0012562 - Update header text on Firewall Request Form
